statements: SELECT * FROM sensor_data;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type FROM sensor_data;
SELECT sensor_value, timestamp FROM sensor_data;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'temperature';
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_location = 'Room A';
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_value FROM sensor_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT AVG(sensor_value) AS average_value FROM sensor_data;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_location, sensor_type FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_value > 50;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM sensor_data;
SELECT MAX(sensor_value) AS max_value FROM sensor_data;
SELECT sensor_id, MAX(sensor_value) AS max_value FROM sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_id;
SELECT sensor_type, COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_type;
SELECT sensor_location, AVG(sensor_value) AS average_value FROM sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_location;
SELECT DISTINCT sensor_type FROM sensor_data;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_value, timestamp FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_location, sensor_type, sensor_value, timestamp FROM sensor_data LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_location LIKE 'Room%';
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_location, sensor_type, sensor_value FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id BETWEEN 1 AND 10;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_location, sensor_type, ROUND(sensor_value, 2) AS rounded_value FROM sensor_data;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_location = 'Living Room';
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, sensor_value FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' AND sensor_value > 25;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_location, sensor_type FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type IN ('Temperature', 'Humidity');
SELECT DISTINCT sensor_type FROM sensor_data;
SELECT sensor_location, COUNT(sensor_id) AS num_readings FROM sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_location;
SELECT AVG(sensor_value) AS avg_value, MAX(sensor_value) AS max_value, MIN(sensor_value) AS min_value FROM sensor_data;
SELECT sensor_location, sensor_type, MAX(sensor_value) AS max_value FROM sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_type;
SELECT sensor_location, sensor_type, TIMESTAMP FROM sensor_data WHERE DATE(timestamp) = CURDATE();
SELECT sensor_location, sensor_type, sensor_value FROM sensor_data WHERE TIMESTAMP BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-07 23:59:59';
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_location FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id % 2 = 0;
SELECT sensor_type, AVG(sensor_value) AS avg_value FROM sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_type HAVING AVG(sensor_value) > 30;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_location, sensor_type FROM sensor_data ORDER BY sensor_location ASC, sensor_id DESC;
SELECT sensor_type, COUNT(*) AS num_readings FROM sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_type ORDER BY num_readings DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_location, sensor_type, sensor_value FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_location LIKE '%Bedroom%' AND sensor_value < 20;
SELECT sensor_location, sensor_type, ROUND(sensor_value, 2) AS rounded_value FROM sensor_data;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, sensor_value FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = (SELECT MAX(sensor_id) FROM sensor_data);
SELECT sensor_type, sensor_location, AVG(sensor_value) AS avg_value FROM sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_type, sensor_location HAVING AVG(sensor_value) > 25;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_location, sensor_type, TIMESTAMP FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_value = (SELECT MAX(sensor_value) FROM sensor_data) LIMIT 1;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_location, sensor_type FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_value > (SELECT AVG(sensor_value) FROM sensor_data);
SELECT sensor_location, sensor_type, COUNT(*) AS num_readings FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_location IN ('Living Room', 'Kitchen') GROUP BY sensor_location, sensor_type;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_location FROM sensor_data UNION SELECT sensor_id, sensor_location FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature';
SELECT * FROM sensors;
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_type FROM sensors;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, sensor_location FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature';
SELECT * FROM sensor_readings;
SELECT reading_id, sensor_id, reading_value FROM sensor_readings WHERE reading_value > 50;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_readings FROM sensor_readings;
SELECT sensor_name, reading_value, reading_timestamp FROM sensors JOIN sensor_readings ON sensors.sensor_id = sensor_readings.sensor_id;
SELECT sensor_name, AVG(reading_value) AS avg_value FROM sensors JOIN sensor_readings ON sensors.sensor_id = sensor_readings.sensor_id GROUP BY sensor_name;
SELECT sensor_name, MAX(reading_value) AS max_value FROM sensors JOIN sensor_readings ON sensors.sensor_id = sensor_readings.sensor_id GROUP BY sensor_name;
SELECT sensor_name, MIN(reading_value) AS min_value FROM sensors JOIN sensor_readings ON sensors.sensor_id = sensor_readings.sensor_id GROUP BY sensor_name;
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_location, COUNT(*) AS total_readings FROM sensors JOIN sensor_readings ON sensors.sensor_id = sensor_readings.sensor_id GROUP BY sensor_name, sensor_location;
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_location, reading_value, reading_timestamp FROM sensors JOIN sensor_readings ON sensors.sensor_id = sensor_readings.sensor_id WHERE reading_value < 20;
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_location, reading_value, reading_timestamp FROM sensors JOIN sensor_readings ON sensors.sensor_id = sensor_readings.sensor_id WHERE reading_timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_location, reading_value, reading_timestamp FROM sensors JOIN sensor_readings ON sensors.sensor_id = sensor_readings.sensor_id ORDER BY reading_timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_location, reading_value, reading_timestamp FROM sensors JOIN sensor_readings ON sensors.sensor_id = sensor_readings.sensor_id ORDER BY reading_value ASC;

SELECT sensor_name, sensor_location, reading_value, reading_timestamp FROM sensors JOIN sensor_readings ON sensors.sensor_id = sensor_readings.sensor_id WHERE sensor_type = 'Humidity' AND reading_value > 60;
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_location, reading_value, reading_timestamp FROM sensors JOIN sensor_readings ON sensors.sensor_id = sensor_readings.sensor_id WHERE sensor_name LIKE '%1%';
SELECT DISTINCT sensor_type FROM sensors;
SELECT DISTINCT sensor_location FROM sensors;
SELECT sensor_name, reading_value FROM sensors JOIN sensor_readings ON sensors.sensor_id = sensor_readings.sensor_id WHERE sensor_location IN ('Room A', 'Room B');
SELECT * FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' ORDER BY sensor_location DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT sensor_name, reading_value, reading_timestamp FROM sensors INNER JOIN sensor_readings ON sensors.sensor_id = sensor_readings.sensor_id WHERE sensor_location = 'Room A' AND reading_value > 50 ORDER BY reading_timestamp ASC LIMIT 10;

SELECT sensor_name, AVG(reading_value) AS avg_reading_value FROM sensors INNER JOIN sensor_readings ON sensors.sensor_id = sensor_readings.sensor_id GROUP BY sensor_name HAVING avg_reading_value > 30 ORDER BY avg_reading_value DESC;

SELECT sensor_name, COUNT(reading_id) AS num_readings FROM sensors LEFT JOIN sensor_readings ON sensors.sensor_id = sensor_readings.sensor_id GROUP BY sensor_name HAVING num_readings < 100 ORDER BY num_readings ASC;
SELECT sensor_type, COUNT(DISTINCT sensor_location) AS num_locations FROM sensors GROUP BY sensor_type HAVING num_locations > 1 ORDER BY num_locations DESC;

SELECT sensor_name, reading_value FROM sensors INNER JOIN sensor_readings ON sensors.sensor_id = sensor_readings.sensor_id WHERE reading_timestamp BETWEEN NOW() - INTERVAL 7 DAY AND NOW() ORDER BY reading_timestamp ASC LIMIT 20;

SELECT sensor_name, MAX(reading_value) AS max_reading_value FROM sensors INNER JOIN sensor_readings ON sensors.sensor_id = sensor_readings.sensor_id GROUP BY sensor_name ORDER BY max_reading_value DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, sensor_location FROM sensors WHERE sensor_id IN (SELECT sensor_id FROM sensor_readings GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 100) ORDER BY sensor_id ASC LIMIT 10;

SELECT sensor_name, reading_value, reading_timestamp FROM sensors INNER JOIN sensor_readings ON sensors.sensor_id = sensor_readings.sensor_id WHERE reading_timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND reading_value < 20 ORDER BY sensor_name ASC, reading_timestamp DESC LIMIT 15;

SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, COUNT(reading_id) AS num_readings FROM sensors LEFT JOIN sensor_readings ON sensors.sensor_id = sensor_readings.sensor_id GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING num_readings < 50 ORDER BY num_readings ASC;

SELECT sensor_name, AVG(reading_value) AS avg_reading_value FROM sensors INNER JOIN sensor_readings ON sensors.sensor_id = sensor_readings.sensor_id WHERE sensor_type = 'Humidity' GROUP BY sensor_name HAVING avg_reading_value > 60 ORDER BY avg_reading_value DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT sensor_location, MIN(reading_value) AS min_reading_value FROM sensors INNER JOIN sensor_readings ON sensors.sensor_id = sensor_readings.sensor_id GROUP BY sensor_location HAVING min_reading_value < 10 ORDER BY min_reading_value ASC;

SELECT sensor_name, COUNT(reading_id) AS num_readings FROM sensors LEFT JOIN sensor_readings ON sensors.sensor_id = sensor_readings.sensor_id WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' GROUP BY sensor_name HAVING num_readings > 50 ORDER BY num_readings DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT sensor_name, reading_value, AVG(reading_value) AS avg_reading_value FROM sensors INNER JOIN sensor_readings ON sensors.sensor_id = sensor_readings.sensor_id WHERE sensor_location LIKE '%Room%' GROUP BY sensor_name, reading_value HAVING avg_reading_value < 40 ORDER BY sensor_name, avg_reading_value DESC LIMIT 20;

SELECT sensor_name, reading_value, reading_timestamp FROM sensors INNER JOIN sensor_readings ON sensors.sensor_id = sensor_readings.sensor_id WHERE sensor_name LIKE 'Sensor%' AND reading_timestamp < NOW() - INTERVAL 1 MONTH ORDER BY reading_timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT sensor_name, AVG(reading_value) AS avg_reading_value FROM sensors INNER JOIN sensor_readings ON sensors.sensor_id = sensor_readings.sensor_id WHERE sensor_location IN ('Room A', 'Room B') GROUP BY sensor_name HAVING avg_reading_value > 25 ORDER BY avg_reading_value DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT sensor_type, COUNT(sensor_id) AS num_sensors FROM sensors GROUP BY sensor_type HAVING num_sensors < 5 ORDER BY num_sensors ASC;

SELECT sensor_name, MAX(reading_value) AS max_reading_value FROM sensors INNER JOIN sensor_readings ON sensors.sensor_id = sensor_readings.sensor_id WHERE sensor_type = 'CO2' GROUP BY sensor_name HAVING max_reading_value > 800 ORDER BY max_reading_value DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT sensor_name, reading_value FROM sensors INNER JOIN sensor_readings ON sensors.sensor_id = sensor_readings.sensor_id WHERE reading_timestamp >= '2022-03-01' AND reading_value BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY reading_value ASC, sensor_name ASC LIMIT 15;
SELECT sensor_name, COUNT(DISTINCT sensor_location) AS num_locations FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Pressure' GROUP BY sensor_name HAVING num_locations > 1 ORDER BY num_locations DESC;
SELECT * FROM Sensors
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM Sensors
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, location FROM Sensors WHERE status = true
SELECT * FROM SensorData
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp, value FROM SensorData ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM Dashboard
SELECT dashboard_name, widgets FROM Dashboard
SELECT * FROM Sensors WHERE sensor_id = 1
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM Sensors WHERE sensor_id = 2
SELECT * FROM SensorData WHERE sensor_id = 1
SELECT timestamp, value FROM SensorData WHERE sensor_id = 2 ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT * FROM Dashboard WHERE dashboard_id = 1
SELECT dashboard_name, layout FROM Dashboard WHERE dashboard_id = 2
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM Sensors WHERE status = false
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp, value FROM SensorData WHERE sensor_id = 3
SELECT * FROM Sensors WHERE sensor_id = 4
SELECT dashboard_name, widgets FROM Dashboard WHERE dashboard_id = 3
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, location FROM Sensors ORDER BY sensor_id ASC
SELECT * FROM SensorData ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT dashboard_id, dashboard_name FROM Dashboard WHERE dashboard_id = 4
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM Sensors WHERE sensor_id = 1
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM Sensors WHERE status = TRUE
SELECT sensor_name, location, value FROM Sensors INNER JOIN SensorData ON Sensors.sensor_id = SensorData.sensor_id
SELECT sensor_name, location, timestamp, value FROM Sensors INNER JOIN SensorData ON Sensors.sensor_id = SensorData.sensor_id WHERE Sensors.location = 'Room 1'
SELECT sensor_name, location, timestamp, value FROM Sensors INNER JOIN SensorData ON Sensors.sensor_id = SensorData.sensor_id WHERE SensorData.value > 50
SELECT dashboard_name, layout FROM Dashboard WHERE dashboard_id = 1
SELECT dashboard_name, layout, widgets FROM Dashboard WHERE widgets LIKE '%temperature%'
SELECT * FROM Sensors
SELECT * FROM SensorData WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM Sensors WHERE sensor_name LIKE '%Temperature%'
SELECT * FROM SensorData WHERE value < 10
SELECT sensor_id, MAX(value) FROM SensorData GROUP BY sensor_id
SELECT dashboard_name, COUNT(widgets) FROM Dashboard GROUP BY dashboard_name
SELECT sensor_name, AVG(value) FROM Sensors INNER JOIN SensorData ON Sensors.sensor_id = SensorData.sensor_id GROUP BY sensor_name
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM Sensors
SELECT sensor_name, SUM(value) FROM Sensors INNER JOIN SensorData ON Sensors.sensor_id = SensorData.sensor_id GROUP BY sensor_name HAVING SUM(value) > 100
SELECT sensor_name, COUNT(*) FROM Sensors INNER JOIN SensorData ON Sensors.sensor_id = SensorData.sensor_id GROUP BY sensor_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 5
SELECT sensor_name, AVG(value) FROM Sensors INNER JOIN SensorData ON Sensors.sensor_id = SensorData.sensor_id WHERE Sensors.location = 'Room 2' GROUP BY sensor_name
SELECT dashboard_name, JSON_VALUE(layout, '$.size') AS dashboard_size FROM Dashboard WHERE JSON_VALUE(layout, '$.size') = 'large'
SELECT * FROM sensors;
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_location FROM sensors;
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_type, sensor_status FROM sensors WHERE sensor_location = 'Room A';
SELECT * FROM sensor_data;
SELECT sensor_id, data_value, data_timestamp FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 1;
SELECT data_value FROM sensor_data WHERE data_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-01-31 23:59:59';
SELECT alert_description, alert_timestamp FROM alerts;
SELECT * FROM alerts WHERE sensor_id = 2;
SELECT sensor_name, data_value, alert_description FROM sensors s JOIN sensor_data d ON s.sensor_id = d.sensor_id JOIN alerts a ON s.sensor_id = a.sensor_id;
SELECT * FROM dashboard;
SELECT dashboard_name, dashboard_description FROM dashboard;
SELECT * FROM sensors s LEFT JOIN sensor_data d ON s.sensor_id = d.sensor_id WHERE d.data_value > 100;
SELECT sensor_name, dashboard_name, dashboard_description FROM sensors s JOIN dashboard d ON s.sensor_id = d.dashboard_id;
SELECT sensor_name, COALESCE(alert_description, 'No alerts') AS alert_status FROM sensors s LEFT JOIN alerts a ON s.sensor_id = a.sensor_id;
SELECT sensor_name, COUNT(data_id) AS data_count FROM sensors s JOIN sensor_data d ON s.sensor_id = d.sensor_id GROUP BY sensor_name;
SELECT MAX(data_value) AS max_value, MIN(data_value) AS min_value FROM sensor_data;
SELECT sensor_location, AVG(data_value) AS avg_value FROM sensors s JOIN sensor_data d ON s.sensor_id = d.sensor_id GROUP BY sensor_location;
SELECT sensor_name, EXTRACT(MONTH FROM data_timestamp) AS month, AVG(data_value) AS avg_value FROM sensors s JOIN sensor_data d ON s.sensor_id = d.sensor_id GROUP BY sensor_name, month;
SELECT sensor_name, dashboard_name, EXTRACT(HOUR FROM dashboard_created_at) AS hour FROM sensors s JOIN dashboard d ON s.sensor_id = d.dashboard_id;
SELECT sensor_name, SUM(data_value) AS total_value FROM sensors s JOIN sensor_data d ON s.sensor_id = d.sensor_id GROUP BY sensor_name;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, sensor_location, sensor_type, sensor_status FROM sensors;
SELECT * FROM sensors WHERE sensor_location = 'Lab A';
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, sensor_type FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature';
SELECT * FROM sensors WHERE sensor_status = true AND sensor_location LIKE '%Room%';
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, sensor_location, data_value, data_timestamp FROM sensors JOIN sensor_data ON sensors.sensor_id = sensor_data.sensor_id;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, data_value, data_timestamp FROM sensors JOIN sensor_data ON sensors.sensor_id = sensor_data.sensor_id WHERE data_value > 50;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, sensor_location, alert_description, alert_timestamp FROM sensors JOIN alerts ON sensors.sensor_id = alerts.sensor_id;

SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, data_value, data_timestamp, alert_description FROM sensors JOIN sensor_data ON sensors.sensor_id = sensor_data.sensor_id JOIN alerts ON sensors.sensor_id = alerts.sensor_id WHERE alert_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, sensor_location FROM sensors WHERE sensor_id IN (SELECT sensor_id FROM alerts);
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, data_value, data_timestamp FROM sensors JOIN sensor_data ON sensors.sensor_id = sensor_data.sensor_id WHERE sensor_name = 'Sensor A' AND data_timestamp > '2022-02-01';
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, sensor_location, dashboard_name, dashboard_created_at FROM sensors JOIN dashboard ON sensors.sensor_id = dashboard.dashboard_id;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, sensor_location, dashboard_description FROM sensors JOIN dashboard ON sensors.sensor_id = dashboard.dashboard_id WHERE sensor_location = 'Lab B';
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, dashboard_name, dashboard_created_at FROM sensors JOIN dashboard ON sensors.sensor_id = dashboard.dashboard_id WHERE sensor_name = 'Sensor C';

SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, data_value, data_timestamp, alert_description, alert_timestamp FROM sensors JOIN sensor_data ON sensors.sensor_id = sensor_data.sensor_id JOIN alerts ON sensors.sensor_id = alerts.sensor_id WHERE data_value < 20 AND alert_timestamp > '2022-03-01';
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, sensor_location FROM sensors WHERE sensor_type = 'Humidity' OR sensor_location = 'Lab C';

SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, sensor_location, data_value, data_timestamp FROM sensors JOIN sensor_data ON sensors.sensor_id = sensor_data.sensor_id WHERE sensor_name = 'Sensor D' AND data_value < 30 AND data_timestamp > '2022-04-01';
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, data_value, data_timestamp FROM sensors JOIN sensor_data ON sensors.sensor_id = sensor_data.sensor_id ORDER BY data_timestamp DESC;

SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, sensor_type, data_value, data_timestamp FROM sensors JOIN sensor_data ON sensors.sensor_id = sensor_data.sensor_id WHERE sensor_type = 'Pressure' ORDER BY data_value DESC;

SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, sensor_location, alert_description, alert_timestamp FROM sensors JOIN alerts ON sensors.sensor_id = alerts.sensor_id WHERE alert_timestamp > '2022-05-01' ORDER BY alert_timestamp ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, sensor_location FROM sensors WHERE sensor_status = false;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, sensor_location, dashboard_name, dashboard_created_at FROM sensors JOIN dashboard ON sensors.sensor_id = dashboard.dashboard_id WHERE dashboard_name IS NOT NULL;

SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, sensor_type, data_value, data_timestamp FROM sensors JOIN sensor_data ON sensors.sensor_id = sensor_data.sensor_id WHERE sensor_name LIKE '%Sensor%' AND data_value > 40;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, sensor_location, alert_description FROM sensors JOIN alerts ON sensors.sensor_id = alerts.sensor_id WHERE alert_description ILIKE '%error%';
SELECT * FROM sensors;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, location FROM sensors;
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM sensors WHERE status = 'active';
SELECT * FROM sensor_data;
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp, value FROM sensor_data;
SELECT * FROM sensor_alerts;
SELECT sensor_id, timestamp, message FROM sensor_alerts;
SELECT * FROM dashboard_users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM dashboard_users;
SELECT * FROM dashboard_logs;
SELECT timestamp, action FROM dashboard_logs;
SELECT * FROM sensors WHERE sensor_name LIKE '%temperature%';
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE value > 100;
SELECT * FROM sensor_alerts WHERE message = 'Critical Alert';
SELECT * FROM dashboard_logs WHERE action = 'Login';
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM sensors ORDER BY sensor_name ASC;
SELECT username, email FROM dashboard_users ORDER BY email DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM sensor_alerts WHERE timestamp < '2022-02-15';
SELECT * FROM dashboard_logs WHERE timestamp > '2022-03-01';
SELECT * FROM sensors;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name FROM sensors WHERE status='active';
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM sensors WHERE status='inactive' ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_data WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT sensor_id, AVG(value) FROM sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_id;
SELECT * FROM sensor_alerts WHERE message LIKE '%error%';
SELECT username, email FROM dashboard_users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT sensor_name, timestamp, value FROM sensors INNER JOIN sensor_data ON sensors.sensor_id = sensor_data.sensor_id;
SELECT sensor_name, location, message FROM sensors INNER JOIN sensor_alerts ON sensors.sensor_id = sensor_alerts.sensor_id WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_logs FROM dashboard_logs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT sensor_name, action, username FROM sensors JOIN dashboard_logs ON sensors.location = dashboard_logs.action ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT sensor_id, location FROM sensors;
SELECT sensor_id, AVG(value) AS avg_value FROM sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING AVG(value) > 50;
SELECT sensor_name, COUNT(*) AS total_alerts FROM sensors LEFT JOIN sensor_alerts ON sensors.sensor_id = sensor_alerts.sensor_id GROUP BY sensor_name;
SELECT * FROM sensors WHERE sensor_id IN (SELECT sensor_id FROM sensor_data GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 100);
SELECT sensor_name, SUM(value) AS total_value FROM sensors LEFT JOIN sensor_data ON sensors.sensor_id = sensor_data.sensor_id GROUP BY sensor_name ORDER BY total_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM sensor_alerts WHERE sensor_id IN (SELECT sensor_id FROM sensors WHERE status='active');
SELECT DISTINCT username FROM dashboard_users WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM dashboard_logs WHERE action='login');
SELECT sensor_name, MAX(timestamp) AS latest_timestamp FROM sensors LEFT JOIN sensor_data ON sensors.sensor_id = sensor_data.sensor_id GROUP BY sensor_name;
SELECT sensor_name, username FROM sensors INNER JOIN dashboard_logs ON sensors.sensor_id = dashboard_logs.user_id WHERE action='update';
